verses.verse: At the <S%H7093>end<s%> of every <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H8059>release.<s%>

This is the <S%H1697>way<s%> of the <S%H8059>release:<s%> every <S%H4874>creditor<s%> shall <S%H8059>release<s%> that which he has <S%H5383>lent<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor;<s%> he shall not <S%H5065>exact<s%> it of his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> and his <S%H251>brother;<s%> because <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H8059>release<s%> has been <S%H7121>proclaimed.<s%>
Of a <S%H5237>foreigner<s%> you may <S%H5065>exact<s%> <S%H251>it:<s%> but whatever of your is with your brother your <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall <S%H8058>release.<s%>

<S%H657>However<s%> there shall be no <S%H34>poor<s%> with <S%H3068>you;<s%> (for Yahweh will <S%H1288>surely<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> you in the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to possess <S%H3423>it;<s%>)

if only you <S%H8085>diligently<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> all this <S%H4687>commandment<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H1696>you,<s%> as he promised <S%H5670>you:<s%> and you shall lend to <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> but you shall not <S%H5670>borrow;<s%> and you shall <S%H4910>rule<s%> over <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> but they shall not rule over <S%H4910>you.<s%>

If a poor <S%H34>man,<s%> <S%H34>one<s%> of your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> is with you within <S%H259>any<s%> of your <S%H8179>gates<s%> in your <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H553>you,<s%> you shall not harden your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> nor <S%H7092>shut<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> from your <S%H34>poor<s%> <S%H251>brother;<s%>

but you shall <S%H6605>surely<s%> <S%H6605>open<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H5670>him,<s%> and shall surely <S%H5670>lend<s%> him <S%H1767>sufficient<s%> for his <S%H4270>need,<s%> which he <S%H2637>lacks.<s%>

<S%H8104>Beware<s%> that there not be a <S%H1100>base<s%> <S%H1697>thought<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "The <S%H7651>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H8059>release,<s%> is at <S%H7126>hand;<s%>" and your <S%H5869>eye<s%> be <S%H7489>evil<s%> against your <S%H34>poor<s%> <S%H251>brother,<s%> and you <S%H5414>give<s%> him <S%H7121>nothing;<s%> and he cry to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> against <S%H2399>you,<s%> and it be sin to you.

You shall <S%H5414>surely<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3824>him,<s%> and your heart shall not be <S%H3415>grieved<s%> when you <S%H5414>give<s%> to <S%H1558>him;<s%> because that for this <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H1288>bless<s%> you in all your <S%H4639>work,<s%> and in all that you <S%H4916>put<s%> your hand <S%H3027>to.<s%>

For the <S%H34>poor<s%> will never <S%H2308>cease<s%> out <S%H7130>of<s%> the <S%H776>land:<s%> therefore I <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H559>you,<s%> saying, You shall <S%H6605>surely<s%> <S%H6605>open<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> to your <S%H251>brother,<s%> to your <S%H34>needy,<s%> and to your <S%H6041>poor,<s%> in your <S%H776>land.<s%>

If your <S%H251>brother,<s%> a Hebrew <S%H5680>man,<s%> or a Hebrew <S%H5680>woman,<s%> is <S%H4376>sold<s%> to <S%H5647>you,<s%> and serves you <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years;<s%> then in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> you shall let him <S%H7971>go<s%> free from <S%H2670>you.<s%>
When you <S%H7971>let<s%> him go <S%H2670>free<s%> from <S%H7971>you,<s%> you shall not let him go <S%H7387>empty:<s%>

you shall <S%H6059>furnish<s%> him <S%H6059>liberally<s%> out of your <S%H6629>flock,<s%> and out of your threshing <S%H1637>floor,<s%> and out of your <S%H3342>winepress;<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H5414>you,<s%> you shall give to him.

You shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> that you were a <S%H5650>bondservant<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> <S%H6680>you:<s%> therefore I command you this <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H3117>today.<s%>
It shall <S%H559>be,<s%> if he tells <S%H3318>you,<s%> "I will not go out from <S%H157>you;<s%>" because he loves you and your <S%H1004>house,<s%> because he is well with <S%H2895>you;<s%>

then you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> an <S%H4836>awl,<s%> and <S%H5414>thrust<s%> it through his <S%H241>ear<s%> to the <S%H1817>door,<s%> and he shall be your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%> Also to your female <S%H519>servant<s%> you shall do <S%H6213>likewise.<s%>

It shall not seem <S%H7185>hard<s%> to <S%H5869>you,<s%> when you let him <S%H7971>go<s%> <S%H2670>free<s%> from <S%H4932>you;<s%> for to the double of the <S%H7939>hire<s%> of a <S%H7916>hireling<s%> has he <S%H5647>served<s%> you <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years:<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H1288>bless<s%> you in all that you <S%H6213>do.<s%>

All the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> <S%H2145>males<s%> that are <S%H3205>born<s%> of your <S%H1241>herd<s%> and of your <S%H6629>flock<s%> you shall <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%> you shall do no <S%H5647>work<s%> with the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of your <S%H7794>herd,<s%> nor <S%H1494>shear<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of your <S%H6629>flock.<s%>

You shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> by <S%H8141>year<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall <S%H977>choose,<s%> you and your <S%H1004>household.<s%>

If it has any <S%H3971>blemish,<s%> is <S%H6455>lame<s%> or <S%H5787>blind,<s%> or has <S%H7451>any<s%> <S%H3971>defect<s%> <S%H2076>whatever,<s%> you shall not sacrifice it to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

You shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it within your <S%H8179>gates:<s%> the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> and the <S%H2889>clean<s%> shall eat it <S%H3162>alike,<s%> as the <S%H6643>gazelle,<s%> and as the <S%H354>hart.<s%>
Only you shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> its <S%H1818>blood;<s%> you shall <S%H8210>pour<s%> it out on the <S%H776>ground<s%> as <S%H4325>water.<s%>
